channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bags of rubbish, tins, paper, 16th June
item.description:
Rubbish dump in general - bags, tins, bottles, filth. In this corner where there are bushes around.

item.title: Grass cutting not being down to the edges of the verges in Avenue Road, 16th June
item.description:
Grass cutting not being down to the edges of the verges in Avenue Road and its really overgrown round the sides where the walls are. Can this be looked into please
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Avenue Road, Northumberland Heath, London

item.title: Road markings need to be redone, 16th June
item.description:
Hi there The public parking spaces in Tonge Close have all but lost their markings, so it makes it very difficult for cars to park efficiently. Can the markings be refreshed please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tonge Close, Eden Park, London
